transcript.text:
￼


























SMS Notification
Setup India SMS

10 min
overview promote your business with sms messages integration directly delivered to your customer’s mobile phone with a large customer list, stay in touch with the customers via custom text messages purpose integrate this third party api into your onprintshop web store and stay connected with your customers how to integrate read the below systematic guide to integrate india sms with your onprintshop website 1 register with india sms 1 register with india sms visit the india sms website from the home page, select the suitable bulk sms service you want and click on the buy now! button on the next page, select the package for the selected service and click on buy now this will take you to the sign up page enter the details and submit the sign up form specify the payment details and complete the payment of the selected package complete the verification and successfully create your account 2 login to india sms 2 login to india sms after completing the verification, india sms will send you an email this email will contain the login link, your username, and password follow the login link and enter the given username and password to login successfully 3 india sms dashboard 3 india sms dashboard after logging in you will be able to check your dashboard herein, you can check for available sms credit and the number of current sent smss also, you will get the option to recharge your account, check the date wise summary and last login ip 4 recharge 4 recharge recharge your account with any pack according to your future usage to create a sender id (explained in the next step) 5 create sender id 5 create sender id to create a sender id go to india sms dashboard >> settings (left sidebar) >> manage senderid enter the desired sender name in the block and submit after you create a sender id, india sms will check your profile and approve the id created to view the approved id go to the india sms dashboard >> settings (left sidebar) >> manage senderid 6 configuration into admin panel 6 configuration into admin panel to configure india sms into your admin panel go to admin panel > store configurations > external service settings > sms notifications tab > india sms > ‘action’ menu> ‘edit’ option under the settings section fill in the necessary details enter username , password and sender name select and assign the countries set the mode as " live " enter the email address and save the details
Did this page help you?
